content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
No structures have been successfully placed on the map so far. Although the lab was targeted as the central research structure for supplying Automation Science Packs, repeated attempts to craft and position it have not resulted in any firm placement. Other entities—such as furnaces used for smelting—were referenced during resource processing but remain part of transient operations rather than completed, agent‐built structures.

ERROR TIPS
• Incorrect API usage for entity retrieval
 – When calling get_entities, use the correct parameter format. Avoid unsupported keywords (for example, do not supply a 'radius' keyword if not part of the function’s signature) and ensure that the number of arguments matches the expected count.
  
• Handling empty or null query results
 – Always verify the output of get_entities before iterating over its result. If it may return None, substitute an empty list to prevent iteration errors.
  
• Lab inventory and placement issues
 – Confirm that the lab item is available in the inventory before attempting placement. Validating resource availability prior to invoking placement operations can prevent errors related to missing items.
  
• Resource and sub-ingredient shortages during lab crafting
 – Review the complete set of ingredients required for lab construction (including intermediary items such as iron-gear-wheels, electronic-circuits, and copper-cables) to ensure that production meets all recipe prerequisites. Adjust upstream production (smelting, crafting of intermediates) to resolve shortages before retrying lab crafting.
